      • doSuspend

        public RedirectView doSuspend(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String action,
                              RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                              Model model)
        Suspend or Activate User Post Form handler using URI of /doSuspendActivate.
        Parameters:
        userId - User ID to suspend
        action - If 1 then suspend else activate
        redirectAttributes - Redirect Attributes for MVC redirect request
        model - MVC Model
        Returns:
        redirect to the Administration View
